Great quality and it's true to size love it!!!!
This  was a gift for my grandson- he really  loved  his gift.

This sweatshirt looks as pictured and the color/design were right on. Sizing seems good and the fabric is soft. Overall it's a great sweatshirt and seems well made except the zipper. The zipper feels very cheap and at the risk of not making sense, it is quite "skinny". We told our son to be careful and not pull on it too much because we're worried it will break. It does not glide well and sort of catches on itself . So far so good though and he loves the look, so that's great.
The quality is nice in the style is cool. Keeps me warm on my walks to work.
Very cute jacket. Has a nice weight to it and feels great. I really like this jacket.
She loves it,  the quality is very soft, the style is so cute. The material is thick. Perfect size for my wife.  Value for money. Highly recommended 👌.  Thank you!

I like my sweatshirts big. I order an XL. It fits great with still plenty of room to move. The fabric is soft and very comfortable to wear. The stitching of the letters is nicely done and it looks great!  The zipper moves well up and down. And the hood is very big and comfy. I am super pleased with the sweatshirt.  Suggestion-- order way bigger than you want for a perfect fit! I don't like things tight and glad I didn't order my size-- or I would have had to return for a bigger size.  I am very pleased with the quality and comfort of the sweatshirt.

It’s a OK quality, but it is definitely Chinese sized. Meaning that it’s size in a way that is very small for my son and we needed an extra large or even a 2X but for Chinese size I would recommend getting a 3X if you need an extra large.

I bought this hoodie for its cool design and trendy look, and it definitely stands out.  Pros: • The embroidery is vibrant and adds a nice touch to the hoodie. • It’s oversized, making it super comfy and perfect for layering.  Cons: • The material feels a bit thin, so I’m not sure how warm it will be in colder weather. • The zipper gets stuck sometimes, which is a little frustrating.  It’s a solid hoodie overall, but a few improvements would make it perfect.

This product was insanely soft and comfortable. When I first put the hoodie on I wasn’t expecting the linen to be so quality but it was. The hoodie was also a good size, I ordered a medium and it fits like a large so the product definitely runs big. But overall very comfortable as nice fitting 10/10.
The material is very poor and there are two zipper pullers and the zipper doesn’t even move the size was small too tbh I do not recommend

评论概述: Dynict Unisex Letter Embroidery Trendy Hoodies
评论详情: This is a nice thick hoodie. It's well made. However it didn't launder very well. I had to cut a lot of threads after washing it. But it is comfortable. It's true to color but I think it's made a bit small.

This hoodie is really cool!  I was a little skeptical based on some of the reviews, but I'm glad I trusted my gut and went ahead and got this for my husband (who is from Long Island).  First of all, I loved the distressed design of the "NY" on the front - it's so different and unique!  The hoodie itself is a very soft, comfortable material and is fleece lined.  It's oversized and seems true to size (I ordered an XL for my husband).  The zipper is good quality and slides up and down easily.  Overall this is a very unique, comfortable hoodie and is a good value for the price.
This is a well made great quality fashionable hoodie. I recommend this product!👍

评论概述: My 16 year old son LOVES this hoodie!
评论详情: My son was so happy with this hoodie he said I “snapped” and he had to do a whole IG photo shoot for his “fit” (photos included!)  This style is “all the rage” with the teens right now. It’s a bit grunge but still a bit preppy. The letters have raw edges but clean seams. It’s not “wetsuit” material as one reviewer said… it’s just not a knit sweater and it’s not 100% cotton so it has a smooth feel. It’s not thick but it’s not thin. It’s about the same as a pair of joggers.  I ordered a small & it fits my son perfectly. He usually wears an adult small, so it’s accurate in sizing.
Material is thin, good for spring weather. Stylish and looks nice on. Fit is loose.

评论概述: "trendy" hoodie nice fit, but poorly frayed letters
评论详情: The hoodie itself is very nice, and fits to size.  However, look very close to the letters on the front in the pictures and you'll see just how badly they are formed.  The letters themselves are formed with all the edges frayed very badly, then sewn onto the hoodie in a narrow pattern to allow all the multitude of frayed strings to dangle.  It looks like a child made the letters and not a professional company.  I get that this is supposed to be some sort of "trendy" look, but that trend is supposed to create a well worn look.  This does not.  My high school son is going to wear this to school and see if he gets teased.
This jacket came in just as pictured and it’s really good material. Definitely recommend for this cold season .

评论概述: Soft, warm, well-made, definitely size up though!
评论详情: I almost didn’t order this jacket, based on the negative reviews about it being poorly made, scuba-like fabric, too small, etc. Here’s what I think now that I did receive it: i usually wear a Small size in everything, but for this jacket I ordered an X-Large! I’m VERY glad that I did, because I wanted it to be over-sized, and it definitely is what I wanted! The sleeves are very long, the jacket is very roomy. It is warm and cozy, and the fabric is NOT like scuba fabric, it is just like any other soft sweatshirt. Soft on the outside, soft on the inside, where it has nice fleece. I had actually expected to find it to be of some stiff, uncomfortable, odd-looking fabric, just taking my chances, you know… However, I am soooo pleasantly surprised, I cannot say enough about this jacket! The letters are well-stitched, this jacket does NOT look cheap at all, and I very highly recommend it! The zipper is easy to use. It opens on the upper a lower end. It is not difficult at all to maneuver. The hood is nice and large, comfy. I don’t know what the other customers received, but what I received is perfect, honestly! I must say it again, though…. If you want it to be really over-sized, please go 2 or 3 sizes up from what you normally wear. You will be just as pleased as I am! For reference, I am 5’6” tall, 120 pounds, waist 28”. This jacket feels comfortable and goes all the way down to the top of my thighs. It does not look baggy at all, but looks intentionally oversized. I would give this jacket 10 stars, if I could.

评论概述: Not thick or thin, Pretty soft, True to size, Sleeves are a bit short, DO NOT order a size larger.
评论详情: Not thick or thin, Pretty soft, True to size, Sleeves are a bit short, DO NOT order a size larger.  Another reviewer mentioned to order a size larger, well I did and it's too loose on me. I usually wear a Medium, I'm only 168 lbs slim build body.  So unless you are on the thicker size, do no order a size larger but instead order your normal size. I can still ear it fine, just a bit loose.
This is nice has some stretch to it

Ordered Medium this fits like an extra small. Not sure if this even washable horrible material used and will not last I can assure that. Do not recommend.
